# core.functions.atan { #optyx.core.functions.atan }

```python
core.functions.atan(x)
```

Inverse tangent (arctangent).

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                  | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                                               |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing arctan(x), result in (-π/2, π/2). |
